column3: I do that which is good
an age, a cycle of time
I am without a suitable opportunity
verily, truly, amen, so let it be
an untranslatable word that makes a statement contingent
I fill up, make up, fulfill
a male human being, a man
a man, one of the human race
I speak or say in opposition, contradict
worthily, in a manner worthy of
I expect eagerly, wait for eagerly
I have in full, am far, it is enough
I go or come out of, disembark, result
I am dying, am about to die
I uncover, bring to light, reveal
an apostle, a messenger, an envoy, a delegate
not offending, not causing offence, blameless
I am sufficient, I suffice, am content, satisfied
spoil, an object of eager desire, a prize
I greet, salute, pay my respects to
he, she, it, they, them, same
as far as, up to, until
a written book, roll, or volume
the womb, stomach, to be pregnant
I come into being, am born
I come to know, learn, realize
but, on the other hand, and
second, in the second place, for the second time
I spend time, pass time, live
I carry through, differ, surpass, excel
I make righteous, defend the cause of, justify
I think, seem, appear, it seems
I put to the test, prove, examine
a trial, proof; tried, approved character
I am a slave, am subject to, obey
pagan, heathen, gentile; a Gentile, non-Jew
from out, out from among, from
I throw, cast, put out, banish, bring forth, produce
I change for the worse, corrupt, pervert
I turn to confusion, put to shame, reverence
before the face of, in the presence of
I hold forth, pay attention, note, delay
on, to, against, on the basis of, at
I seek after, desire, search for
desire, eagerness for, inordinate desire, lust
I long for, strain after, desire greatly
I cause to prosper, have a happy journey
well reported of, spoken in a kindly spirit
suitable to a sacred character, reverent
a teacher of that which is noble
down from, against, according to, throughout, during
I seize tight hold of, overtake, comprehend
I come down, arrive at, reach
I empty, deprive of content, make unreal
I share, communicate, have fellowship with
I am wanting, am left behind
a word, speech, divine utterance, analogy
I change the outward appearance, transfigure, adapt
about law, one learned in the Law
how much, how great, how many
again, further, on the other hand
all, the whole, every kind of
the official residence of the procurator
I pay attention to, devote myself to
I pour out as a libation
I press together, confine, compel, am afflicted with
I am, exist, am in possession
I take up, receive, answer, suppose, welcome
I am lacking, fall short, suffer need
I make clear, visible, or manifest
as, like as, how, while, so that
